article.class: fl-post post-97443 page type-page status-publish hentry

p.span: All schools and events are cancelled at this time.
Arlington ISD students can continue their learning using the curated resources in the following website.

img.alt: Pre-K Registration for the 2020-2021 School Year opens Monday, April 20. Big dreamers start small.

div.p: If you have a disability or difficulty using this site, email Web Services about inaccessible content.
You may also file a formal grievance in accordance with district policies.
